00021 namespace mcGeometry {
00022 /*============================================================================*/
00027 class Plane : public Quadric {
00028 public:
00029     Plane( const std::vector<double>& normal,
00030            const std::vector<double>& coord) 
00031                                     : _normal(normal), _coordinate(coord)
00032     {
00033         // we only live in 3-space
00034         Require(_normal.size() == 3);
00035         Require(_coordinate.size() == 3);
00036         // require unit normal 
00037         Require(softEquiv(tranSupport::vectorNorm(_normal), 1.0));
00038     }
00039 
00040     Plane* clone() const { return new Plane(*this); }
00041 
00042     ~Plane() { /* * */} 
00043 
00044     bool hasPosSense(const std::vector<double>& position) const;
00045 
00046     HitAndDist intersect(const std::vector<double>& Position, 
00047             const std::vector<double>& Direction, bool PosSense) const;
00048 
00049 protected:
00051     std::ostream& _output( std::ostream& os ) const;
00052 
00053 private:
00054     const std::vector<double> _normal;
00055     const std::vector<double> _coordinate;    // Coordinate of point in plane
00056 };
00057 
00058 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00060 Quadric::HitAndDist Plane::intersect(
00061         const std::vector<double>& position, 
00062         const std::vector<double>& direction,
00063         bool posSense) const
00064 {
00065     Require(position.size() == 3);
00066     Require(direction.size() == 3);
00067     Require(softEquiv(tranSupport::vectorNorm(direction), 1.0));
00068 
00069     // default to "does not hit" values
00070     bool hit = false;
00071     double distance = 0.0;
00072 
00073     double cosine = tranSupport::vectorDot(_normal, direction);
00074 
00075     if ( ((posSense == false) && (cosine > 0))
00076          || ((posSense == true) and (cosine < 0)) )
00077     {
00078         // Headed towards surface and hits it
00079         hit = true;
00080         for( int i = 0; i < 3; ++i ) {
00081             distance += _normal[i]*(_coordinate[i] - position[i]);
00082         }
00083         distance = std::max(0.0, distance/cosine);
00084     }
00085 
00086     return std::make_pair(hit, distance);
00087 }
00088 
00089 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00090 // Information taken from http://mathworld.wolfram.com/Plane.html
00091 // Equation: n.p - n.p0     n = normal vector to plane
00092 //      p = position
00093 //      p0 = point on plane
00094 bool Plane::hasPosSense(const std::vector<double>& position) const{
00095     double eval(0);
00096     for( int i = 0; i < 3; ++i ){
00097         eval += _normal[i]*position[i] - _normal[i]*_coordinate[i];
00098     }
00099 
00100     return _hasPosSense(eval);
00101 }
00102 
00103 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00104 inline std::ostream& Plane::_output( std::ostream& os ) const {
00105     os  << "[ PLANE  Point:  " << std::setw(10) << _coordinate 
00106         << " Normal vector: " << std::setw(10) << _normal << " ]";
00107     return os;
00108 }

00114 class PlaneX : public Quadric {
00115 public:
00116     PlaneX( const double coord) : _coordinate(coord)
00117     { /* * */ }
00118 
00119     PlaneX* clone() const { return new PlaneX(*this); }
00120 
00121     ~PlaneX() { /* * */} 
00122 
00123     bool hasPosSense(const std::vector<double>& position) const;
00124 
00125     HitAndDist intersect(
00126             const std::vector<double>& Position, 
00127             const std::vector<double>& Direction,
00128             bool PosSense) const;
00129

00132     std::ostream& _output( std::ostream& os ) const;
00133

00137 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00138 bool PlaneX::hasPosSense(const std::vector<double>& position) const
00139 {
00140     // 0 is index for X coordinate
00141     return _hasPosSense(position[0]);
00142 }
00143 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00144 Quadric::HitAndDist PlaneX::intersect(
00145                 const std::vector<double>& position, 
00146                 const std::vector<double>& direction,
00147                 bool posSense) const
00148 {
00149     Require(position.size() == 3);
00150     Require(direction.size() == 3);
00151     Require(softEquiv(tranSupport::vectorNorm(direction), 1.0));
00152 
00153     // default to "does not hit" values
00154     bool hit = false;
00155     double distance = 0.0;
00156 
00157     // 0 is index for X coordinate
00158     if (    ((posSense == false) && (direction[0] > 0))
00159          || ((posSense == true)  && (direction[0] < 0)) )
00160     {
00161         // Headed towards surface
00162         hit = true;
00163         distance = (_coordinate - position[0]) / direction[0];
00164         distance = std::max(0.0, distance);
00165     }
00166 
00167     return std::make_pair(hit, distance);
00168 }
00169 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00170 inline std::ostream& PlaneX::_output( std::ostream& os ) const {
00171     os  << "[ PLANE X  Point:  " << std::setw(10) << _coordinate 
00172         << " ]";
00173     return os;
00174 }
